attributes.action: PC World No Longer Offering Windows XP to its customers - many consumers following suit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PC World has stopped selling copies of Windows XP Home & Professional to its customers, it is a blatent attempt to force Windows Vista upon its customers, limiting the market is a breach of consumer rights leaving them with two choices, 1 - buy vista, 2 - do without.

Sign this petition to help stop this from happening!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
